rows.label: qev013302_MSG0001
rows.name: Rgh! Take a hint and get off my tail already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'm flattered by the interest, but alien murder squads
aren't my type![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0003
rows.name:
Huh? What are you doing here?
Don't tell me you're another groupie?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev013302_SEL0011
rows.name: Agree just to keep things moving.

rows.label: qev013302_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev013302_SEL0021
rows.name: Inquire about the situation.

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0004
rows.name:
Perfect. Then you and the creeps following me can
duke it out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'll tell you all about it as soon as these creeps are
pushing up...whatever weird flowers grow around here.
Now help me out already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0006
rows.name:
That was amazing! I think I just became YOUR groupie!
...Is that weird to say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0007
rows.name:
But it's also weird randomly bumping into you here.
Were you working a job in Oblivia like me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0008
rows.name:
Wait, Raleigh sent you? Then you're the cavalry!
And you really saved my hide![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0009
rows.name:
Whatever that black Skell is, it tore my group apart.
We didn't last a minute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0010
rows.name:
We bailed out of our Skells and scattered.
I hightailed it for cover, but those creeps just now
were waiting for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_JNK0030
rows.name: Verify

rows.label: qev013302_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Peter about the other survivors.

rows.label: qev013302_JNK0040
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev013302_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Peter about the black Skell.

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0011
rows.name:
It's so good of you to worry about them.
...Man, I really AM going to start crushing on you
here in a second![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0012
rows.name:
Anyway, I think I got most of the puge cleanup crew to
follow me, so I'm hoping that allowed the others to
make it out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0013
rows.name:
Corwin will probably ass-kick the lot of us, but my
policy for fights you can't win is to turn around
and run like hell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0014
rows.name:
What, you're thinking of going after it or something?
I can't tell if you're brave or stupid. Either way...wow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0015
rows.name:
What can I say? The thing's a beast. We took it on
three against one and didn't stand a snowball's chance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0016
rows.name: It's so damn fast, I don't think we even hit it once...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0017
rows.name:
Oh, sure. NOW I get a call! It's probably my second-
in-command. She's a real mother hen about stuff...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0018
rows.name: P...er! ...ome in, Pet... If you're there, c...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0019
rows.name: Huh? Wait, is that Bates?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0020
rows.name: Bates? Hey! Where are you, man?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0021
rows.name: ...lly rocky area wi...lots of lava...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0022
rows.name:
...amn! Black Ske...on't let up... Peter, requ...ing
...ocation for evac! Where can...go that's safe?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0023
rows.name:
...n't see a way out... Help us!
...eter! ...eter, come in! Pet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0024
rows.name: Dammit! I can barely get a signal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0025
rows.name:
It sounds like he's in Cauldros.
I've never been out there before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0026
rows.name:
You know the lay of the land, right?
Can you steer Bates toward an escape?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0027
rows.name:
...nother dead end. Current positio...can see
O'rrh Sim Castle from here... Near...Emerian
Battlegrounds...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0028
rows.name:
...eed guidance towa...evac spot...
Which directio...head toward?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_JNK0050
rows.name: Go West

rows.label: qev013302_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Bates to head west.

rows.label: qev013302_JNK0060
rows.name: Go South[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Bates to head south.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0029
rows.name:
Roger that. Head...g west now...
From there, I...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0030
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0031
rows.name: We lost the signal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0035
rows.name: ...outh? Roger that. Head...g south, then I...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0036
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0037
rows.name: We lost the signal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0038
rows.name:
I know it's a lot to ask, but please...head to Cauldros
and get him out of there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0039
rows.name:
Bates runs like an asthmatic turtle. If he falls behind
even a little bit, it's all over![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0040
rows.name:
He's just a rookie, and there are tons of things I still
have to show him. Don't let him die out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0041
rows.name:
I'll be fine. I can sprint back to the city in no time flat.
...Unlike Bates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013302_MSG0042
rows.name: So you go help him out, okay? Thanks![ST:wait ]
